means: 卡菲尔人（对非洲黑人的一种蔑称）

sentence.Network_en: The direct ancestor of the modern cat was the Kaffir cat of ancient Egypt.
sentence.Network_cn: 现代猫的直系原种是古埃及的卡菲尔猫。

sentence.Network_en: Boil the thin coconut milk with lemon grass , kaffir leaves, shallot and galanga.
sentence.Network_cn: 把椰浆煮滚,加入蓝姜,柠檬叶, 香茅和小葱头.

PerfectNetExp.abs: as a target of speculation , there is no rational basis for its price , just like the Dutch tulip or northeast with kaffir prices , mainly by speculators gambling psychological decided .作为投机对象，其价格没有什么理性基础，就像当年的荷兰郁金香或东北君子兰的价格，主要由投机者的赌博心理所决定。
kaffel 老马, kaffir 卡菲尔酒, kaffer 卡费尔

list.abs: 泰国柠檬(Kaffir Lime) 一般是叶子拿来做香料。    五月茶这种植物是雌雄异体的。
柠檬叶（Kaffir Lime）原产于亚洲南部，用时可将柠檬叶剪丝或捏碎，并于开始烹调时放入，借用热力逼发香气。Bonnie Yves 沙糖 4…
一磅虾，1/3杯泰国甜辣酱，一个青柠，三片青柠叶（kaffir lime leaves）切丝，一小勺辣酱，一大勺鱼露，三瓣蒜切碎，一小勺红糖，…
Eastweek.com.hk 东周网 -... ... 罐头椰奶（ Tin coconut milk） 青柠檬叶（ Kaffir lime leaves） 九层塔叶（ Sweet basil leaves）.
萱草Hemerocallis fulva L.day lily大花君子兰Clivia miniata Regelscarlet kaffir lily龙舌兰Agave Americana L.century plant, American aloe.

means.word_mean: 1. important for human and animal food; growth habit and stem form similar to Indian corn but having sawtooth-edged leaves
2. an offensive term for any Black African

auth_sentence.content: I like my snakes dead and preferably in a soup it goes well with kaffir leaves and chrysanthemum petals.
auth_sentence.res_content: I like my snakes dead and preferably in a soup it goes well with kaffir leaves and chrysanthemum petals.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I like my snakes dead and preferably in a soup it goes well with kaffir leaves and chrysanthemum petals.

abbreviation.mean_en: kaffir (cat reputedly the ancestor of the common domestic cat)
abbreviation.mean_cn: 非洲黑猫(据说普通家猫的祖先)

abbreviation.mean_en: kaffir crane (black-plume gray crane of southern Africa)
kaffir plum (edible fruit from southern Africa also called kaffir date or kaffir date plum)
abbreviation.mean_cn: 非洲李子(产于南非的可食果类，又叫非洲枣椰子)
